body:
Hi David,


There is no real equivalency between Wavefront materials and Radiance, hence no translator for these.  You can reassign materials based on groups and materials using obj2rad, but you need to create the Radiance materials yourself or get them from a suitable library.


Best,
-Greg
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2017-November/012322.html).</sup>
